title: Movie Posters
content:
hello :)  
i need to know which fonts are used for the Gladiator and The Perfect Storm Movie Poster (just the title)!!!

comments.content:
Gladiator is [Castellar](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012212439/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/castellar_by_adobe_std_roman/?sample_text=GLADIATOR&sample_size=48) made solid.

Perfect Storm is [Trajan Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012212439/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/trajan_pro_bold/?sample_text=PERFECT%20STORM) ( of course... )
